attributes.action: make an urgent public statement to let us know how he is now going to counteract the copying of the uncopyable, biometric british passports he spend BILLIONS of our taxpayer pounds on?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Copied and fraudulent british passports have been used as a means of getting access to assassinate a Hamas terrorist.  I support the assassination but am worried that the huge amount of money spent developing the 'uncopyable' british passport has now been proven to be an absolute waste.  The Prime Minister MUST accept responsibility - PUBLICLY - for that waste.

rejection.details: We are not aware of any confirmation that the passports reportedly involved in this case were the new biometric passports.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
